price: 99. Si, realmente,(los ídolos) que adoraban hubiesen sido verdaderas divinidades, no habrían entrado en el fuego; mas todos permanecerán allí eternamente.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
